post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Intermediate Web Developer
Location:
  Downtown Toronto

Start Date:
  ASAP

Position Type:
  Permanent

Opportunity Number:
  2024984
Our downtown private sector client requires an Intermediate Web Developer

Role and Responsibilities

Design, Develop, test and support state-of-the-art applications, including web services using NET technologies.
Work extensively with other members of our development team, using your analytical and problem-solving abilities to push the boundaries and create new solutions
Analyze business and technical requirements.
Maintain and enhance existing applications
Qualifications and Experience

Experience handling full development cycle of software applications on Microsoft platform.
Proven skills and working experience with MS Visual Basic V5 and V6, ASP (Active Server Pages), HTML, VB Script, JavaScript.
Proven skills and working experience with Web architecture, Microsoft .NET technologies with ASP.NET, C#, VB.NET.
Good database background.
Very good knowledge of Transact SQL and experience in implementing complex logic in stored procedures. SQL development Fundamentals (Stored Procedures, Triggers, Views).Working experience with MS SQL 2000/2005.
Hands on experience with web services XML, XSL, and XSLT.
Familiarity with .NET Framework 2.0 and/or 3.5
Ability to establish priorities and manage multiple projects at the same time.
Ability to work under pressure with tight deadlines.
Desire and ability to build high quality enterprise level applications utilizing technologies across all tiers (GUI, application, service, business domain, persistence, and integration)
University degree or relevant post-secondary diploma
post.title: Intermediate Web Developer(.net)-AltisSPR inc
